name: Terrawurm
description: Terrawurm is a fast paced singleplayer arcade game. Collect precious gems on the hostile surface of Terra; the landscape is dangerous but what lurks beneath is even worse… Grab as much as you can before you’re eaten by the Terrawurm!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.0Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX/ AMD 7750 (DDR3) or higher Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: DirectInput Gamepad recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core 2.5GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960/ AMD HD 5970 or higher Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: DirectInput Gamepad recommended
